articles.title: Cyberattack disrupts check-in systems at major European airports - AP News
articles.description: A cyberattack targeting check-in and boarding systems has disrupted air traffic at several major European airports. On Friday night, the attack hit a service provider affecting airports like Brussels and Berlin's Brandenburg. Brussels Airport says the inciden…
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) A cyberattack targeting check-in and boarding systems disrupted air traffic and caused delays at several of Europes major airports on Saturday, officials said, though the initial impact… [+2288 chars]
